products.title: Devon Stripe Dove Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Light in colourway and incredibly stylish, this Devon Stripe Dove roman blind is a fresh addition to any scheme, especially those trendy, soft grey ones.  The woven stripes are just a touch wider than pinstripe, creating a pattern that's modern, cool and always on style.
products.productdescription: Light in colourway and incredibly stylish, this Devon Stripe Dove roman blind is a fresh addition to any scheme, especially those trendy, soft grey ones.  The woven stripes are just a touch wider than pinstripe, creating a pattern that's modern, cool and always on style.

products.metadescription: Stripes are ever popular and this Devon Stripe Charcoal roman blind is a wonderful exponent of what stripes are all about.
